name: Demosthenes Breen and the Semi-Electric Nectarine.
name_original: Demosthenes Breen and the Semi-Electric Nectarine.
description:
Demosthenes Breen and the Semi-Electric Nectarine is a cartoon-styled, puzzle platformer where a boy named Demosthenes Breen is chosen to fight the evil Thoraglorg using only his semi-electric nectarine! 

The game has three main controls: 

Spacebar (powerjump),

E (interact), 

Q (throw nectarine)

The theme for the GamesPlusJam 4 gamejam was "You're the Best!." All music, sfx, art, and code were created in under 9 days.
